attributes.additional_details:
Please help stop working parents being charged for taking their children out of schools in term time.
Hard working parents are going to be charged for taking children out of school during term.
But these are the people keeping the system afloat.
 But not all companies will give holidays to all their employees during half terms or end of term Because this would bring those company's to a standstill.  So we cannot spend time with our children Just because you work. Makes me wonder why I work.
